Message:
and a sweet fragrance
I’d never smelled before.

It took some time before
realizing that I was
laying in a soft bed,
wrapped in clean sheets.

The moment I had
fainted in the rain,
the Duke of Fran
came to my rescue.
He knew I was a witch,

yet he didn’t hand me over
to the Church.

he knew everything
about me, and took me
in to be his attendant.

I remember how
the Duke looked at me...
with his warm smile.
